Text.Page:
We've learned a lot, but there's still more to uncover. We need to get our current findings to Daien at the Barrens Outpost.

Let him know I sent you. That should improve his mood.

Aresk hasn't found the ancient treasures either?

So much blood spilled for so little gain. Perhaps we should shift our focus.

I'll devise a plan. I'm good at those.
